entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
